subject: Re: junitx: access levels
msgSnippet: Hi, Can you send me an example of using the getInstance method. I don t know which class it is a method of. -Saritha ... one ... get that
messageBody:
Hi,

Can you send me an example of using the getInstance method. I don't
know which class it is a method of.

-Saritha

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Robert Watkins <yahoo@t...> wrote:
> David wrote:
>
> >The constructor would be private if is a singleton class i.e only
one
> >instance is created and you use a static getInstance() method to
get that
> >instance.
> >
> >
> But why can't your test use the getInstance method()?
